name: Snak Man
description:
Eat dots to beat levels as you swipe your way around the map. Avoid the ghouls as you grow longer and longer. Use power ups to beat challenging levels.

Snak Man is an awesome game and fun for all ages! Challenge your friends to get the highest score! This is a Brand New Viral Trending Game from Zoom. We thank you for playing, and hope you enjoy! Download and Play Now for Free!

Thanks,
